p: The library of compounds 9, 11, 12, 14, 15, 16 and 21 was then assessed on different purified recombinant MTases. All compounds were initially screened at 50 μM against ZIKV NS5‐MTase and hRNMT as well as against DENV NS5‐MTase due to its similarity with ZIKV protein. The SAM mimetic sinefungin was included as control.
